plays.text: Penalty to Alexander Svitov 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding Steve Yzerman
Goal scored by Nicklas Lidstrom assisted by Brendan Shanahan and Pavel Datsyuk
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Hooking Vincent Lecavalier
Goal scored by Mathieu Dandenault assisted by Igor Larionov and Luc Robitaille
Penalty to Maxim Kuznetsov 2 minutes for Interference Vincent Lecavalier
Goal scored by Dan Boyle assisted by Vincent Lecavalier
Penalty to Steve Yzerman 2 minutes for Holding Vincent Lecavalier
Penalty to Boyd Devereaux 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Ben Clymer
Penalty to Maxim Kuznetsov 2 minutes for Slashing Vaclav Prospal
Penalty to Dan Boyle 2 minutes for Slashing Brett Hull
Penalty to Igor Larionov 2 minutes for Tripping Tim Taylor
Penalty to Brad Richards 2 minutes for High Sticking Dmitri Bykov
Penalty to Brad Richards 2 minutes for High Sticking Dmitri Bykov
Penalty to John Grahame 2 minutes for Roughing Tomas Holmstrom served by Fredrik Modin
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Pavel Datsyuk and Henrik Zetterberg
Penalty to Jason Woolley 2 minutes for Crosschecking Fredrik Modin served by Marcus Ragnarsson
Goal scored by Vaclav Prospal assisted by Vincent Lecavalier and Brad Richards
